name: My Girlfriend Really Wants a PUPPY!!
name_original: My Girlfriend Really Wants a PUPPY!!
description:
How long can you delay the inevitable and prevent your girlfriend from buying a puppy? The game also includes a short story in-between gameplay segments.

Use the correct responses based on their colours! If a word leaves the screen, you lose HP!

Controls

Shoot with left mouse click, change response type with the mouse scroll wheel, or with A + D!
